trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ComboBox" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ComboBox" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the class that defines the type that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da classe que define o tipo que está associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "ComboBox".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "ComboBox".

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, this method returns a reference to the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />; otherwise, this method calls the base implementation on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="pattern" /> é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, esse método retorna uma referência à instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />; caso contrário, esse método chama a implementação base em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco de entrada do teclado no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> que está associado a esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> object cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> que está associado a esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> não pode receber foco.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o valor é somente leitura; <see langword="false" /> se ele pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.target: O valor de cadeia de caracteres de um controle.
